ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-02-03 19:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-02-03 19:10:00
Category I activation for 25-year-old male with upper extremity injury.
Stab wound to left arm near brachial region. Extremity trauma confirmed.
Left upper extremity with wound in proximity to brachial artery.
GCS 15.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-02-03 19:30:00
Wound to left upper arm. Report of injury near major vessel.
No vascular examination documented.
No pulse examination performed.
No Doppler or ABI obtained.
No imaging ordered.
Patient awaiting further evaluation.
